Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HPROENUM

The basic type HPROENUM specifies a type used to enumerate through a list of RIB providers.

Discussion

The Miles provider enumeration functions all work similarly - you set a local variable of type HPROENUM to HPROENUM_FIRST and then call the enumeration function until it returns failure.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_enumerate_3D_providers, AIL_enumerate_filters
